rows.name: Witchsign
rows.description: The next living creature born within 1 mile is mutated.

rows.name: Soured Milk
rows.description: All milk within [[1d100]] yards goes sour instantly.

rows.name: Blight
rows.description: Willpower Bonus fields within Willpower Bonus miles suffer a blight, and all crops rot overnight.

rows.name: Soulwax
rows.description: Your ears clog instantly with a thick wax. Gain 1 @Condition[Deafened] Condition, which is not removed until someone cleans them for you (with a successful use of the Heal Skill).

rows.name: Witchlight
rows.description: You glow with an eerie light related to your Lore, emitting as much light as a large bonfire, which lasts for [[1d10]] Rounds.

rows.name: Fell Whispers
rows.description: Pass a Routine (+20) Willpower Test or gain 1 Corruption point.

rows.name: Rupture
rows.description: Your nose, eyes, and ears bleed profusely. Gain [[1d10]] @Condition[Bleeding] Conditions.

rows.name: Soulquake
rows.description: Gain the @Condition[Prone] Condition.

rows.name: Unfasten
rows.description: On your person, every buckle unfastens, and every lace unties, which may cause belts to fall, pouches to open, bags to fall, and armour to slip.

rows.name: Wayward Garb
rows.description: Your clothes seem to writhe with a mind of their own. Receive 1 @Condition[Entangled] Condition with a Strength of [[1d10*5]] to resist.

rows.name: Curse of Temperence
rows.description: All alcohol within [[1d100]] yards goes bad, tasting bitter and foul.

rows.name: Souldrain
rows.description: Gain 1 @Condition[Fatigued] Condition, which remains for [[1d10]] hours.

rows.name: Driven to Distraction
rows.description: If engaged in combat, gain the @Condition[Surprised] Condition. Otherwise, you are completely startled, your heart racing, and unable to concentrate for a few moments.

rows.name: Unholy Visions
rows.description: Fleeting visions of profane and unholy acts harass you. Receive a @Condition[Blinded] Condition; pass a Challenging (+0) Cool Test or gain another.

rows.name: Cloying Tongue
rows.description: All Language Tests (including Casting Tests) suffer a -10 penalty for [[1d10]] Rounds.

rows.name: The Horror!
rows.description: Pass a Hard (-20) Cool Test or gain 1 @Condition[Broken] Condition.

rows.name: Curse of Corruption
rows.description: Gain 1 Corruption point.

rows.name: Double Trouble
rows.description: The effect of the spell you cast occurs elsewhere within [[1d10]] miles. At the GM's discretion, where possible it should have consequences.

rows.name: Multiplying Misfortune
rows.description: Roll twice on @Table[minormis]{this table}, rerolling any results between 91-00.

rows.name: Cascading Chaos
rows.description: Roll again on the @Table[majormis].
